moves.name: Glare
moves.description: The user intimidates the target with the pattern on its belly to cause paralysis.

moves.name: Bulldoze
moves.description: The user stomps down on the ground and attacks everything in the area. Hit Pokémon's Speed stat is reduced.

moves.name: Dragon Breath
moves.description: The user exhales a mighty gust that inflicts damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Bite
moves.description: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. It may make the target flinch.

moves.name: Safeguard
moves.description: The user creates a protective field that prevents status problems for five turns.

moves.name: Dig
moves.description: The user burrows, then attacks on the second turn. It can also be used to exit dungeons.

moves.name: Bind
moves.description: Things such as long bodies or tentacles are used to bind and squeeze the target for four to five turns.

moves.name: Land's Wrath
moves.description: The user gathers the energy of the land and focuses that power on opposing Pokémon to damage them.

moves.name: Sandstorm
moves.description: A five-turn sandstorm is summoned to hurt all combatants except the Rock, Ground, and Steel types.

moves.name: Haze
moves.description: The user creates a haze that eliminates every stat change among all the Pokémon engaged in battle.

moves.name: Crunch
moves.description: The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs. It may also lower the target's Defense stat.

moves.name: Earthquake
moves.description: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes those around it.

moves.name: Camouflage
moves.description: The user's type is changed depending on its environment, such as at water's edge, in grass, or in a cave.

moves.name: Dragon Pulse
moves.description: The target is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user's gaping mouth.

moves.name: Dragon Dance
moves.description: The user vigorously performs a mystic, powerful dance that boosts its Attack and Speed stats.

moves.name: Coil
moves.description: The user coils up and concentrates. This raises its Attack and Defense stats as well as its accuracy.

moves.name: Extreme Speed
moves.description: The user charges the target at blinding speed. This attack always goes before any other move.

moves.name: Outrage
moves.description: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. It then becomes confused, however.
